The statement from Bashir Ahmad: the personal aide of President Muhammadu Buhari, posted on his Twitter account on December 20, 2020, commending President Buhari for the rescue of the kidnapped children.
The quote attributed to Joseph Cullen: identified as a "special rapporteur, Lake Chad/West Africa" for the European Union Human Rights Forum, praising President Buhari's rescue efforts.
The publication of the statement in lead: The Sun, The Independent, The Nation, New Telegraph, Legit NG, and Channels TV.
The dismissal of the claim as false by t: with Commission spokesman Peter Stano stating that no such organization or person exists.
